screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .sgtp file in Simon Tatham's Puzzles
screenshot.caption: SGTP file open in Simon Tatham's Puzzles

description: Simon Tatham's Portable Puzzle Collection is a collection of 40 puzzle games available for Windows, Mac, and Unix, as well as on the web. Developer Chris Boyle ported the collection to Android under the name Simon Tatham's Puzzles, so players can access the puzzles offline on Android smartphones and tablets.

While solving a puzzle in Simon Tatham's Puzzles, players can save their progress to an SGTP file. Each SGTP file is a plain text file that contains information about the puzzle being played and the moves a player has made.
To save your progress to an SGTP file while solving a puzzle:
